properties.body:
EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
GABON.
DNC 01.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER
   NOTICE BY M/V POLARCUS NADIA TOWING
   9260 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   01-48.09S 008-43.25E, 01-40.15S 008-56.00E,
   01-50.30S 009-02.00E, 01-58.25S 008-50.00E.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2854/14.
